product_name: ExOfficio Air Strip Lite Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep your cool with the lightweight, travel-friendly ExOfficio Air Strip(TM) Lite Shirt. With all its functional details, including UPF protection and ventilation, it'll be the shirt you reach for. Lightweight nylon/polyester blend resists wrinkles and wicks moisture off skin; fabric dries quickly. Offers very good protection from the sun: Ultraviolet Protection Factor (UPF) of 30. 3-position sun collar shades your neck from the sun's searing rays. Integrated Airomesh ventilation system on back yoke and side seams allows cooling airflow. Sleeves roll up and secure with button-closure tabs. Pleated front chest pockets with rip-and-stick closures stow trail items; zippered security pocket under right chest pocket holds small valuables. Rip-and-stick utility tab lets you secure must-have trail and travel items. ExOfficio Air Strip Lite Shirt has a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Keep your cool with the lightweight, travel-friendly ExOfficio Air Strip(TM) Lite Shirt. With all its functional details, including UPF protection and ventilation, it'll be the shirt you reach for.
